childFeedsJson.name: Warehouse
childFeedsJson.description: In the Acme - ECommerce platform, the Warehouse system is responsible for managing and optimizing inventory storage, handling, and distribution. It tracks product stock levels, processes inbound and outbound shipments, and ensures efficient organization of goods within the warehouse. The system integrates with other components like Order Management and Inventory systems to update stock information, allocate products for orders, and coordinate with shipping services. The Warehouse system aims to streamline operations, reduce errors, and ensure timely fulfillment of customer orders.

childFeedsJson.name: Order Management System
childFeedsJson.description: The Order Management System (OMS) in the Acme - ECommerce platform is responsible for overseeing the entire lifecycle of customer orders. It handles order placement, processing, tracking, and fulfillment. The OMS integrates with other systems such as inventory management, payment gateways, and shipping services to automate and streamline workflows. It ensures accurate order processing, updates order statuses in real-time, manages returns and exchanges, and provides customer service teams with essential information to address inquiries and issues effectively.

childFeedsJson.name: InventoryManagement
childFeedsJson.description: Subscribe to order created and update and publishes low or no inventory events

childFeedsJson.name: Credit Management System
childFeedsJson.description:
